file_content.text: I've heard reports a Sith Lord gave the order to attack the temple and take those shields. Probably just a rumor, but we'll look into it.
So I hear. There's a lot of Imperials running scared because of you. I'll see the shields are secured for transport.
Here. I've had this since I was a lieutenant; it deserves better than catching dust. Put it to good use.
I need those shields back ASAP. Show me what you can do.
Master Jedi? I realize your time's short, but I need help.
Reporting for duty? Good. Grunts I have, but I need a leader.
Hey, Captain, mind taking some Republic military work? I need every body I can get, and I have credits doing nothing.
Mind signing on for a job? I need all the bodies I can get, and I have credits doing nothing.
We're in the final stages of our push to retake the Jedi Temple. Sent techs out to deliver prototype shields to our boys, powered by Adegan crystals.
Imps got wise and ambushed the techs. Stole the shields. The men...well, seems like the Imps want that technology, and they're not being gentle.
Since they lost Corellia, the Empire needs every advantage it can get.
They're desperate.
Just so. They've got nothing to lose, so they'll take any risk.
The compassionate don't last long in the Empire.
Gentle is not their nature.
Social philosophy's not my field, but sounds like you understand the stakes.
That's because they're scum.
I like how you think, care to put it into practice?
I know places where a military-grade Republic shield would sell for a year's salary.
Personal shields are valuable.
Lucky for you, I've got no time to ask just how you know that.
So you need help.
Good, you catch on fast.
Your problem, not mine.
Hmph. If you fight like you run your mouth, we might have a use for each other.
We haven't sighted the shields on the Jedi Temple battlefield, so I'm thinking the Imps took them into the Temple itself. I need someone who can make it inside.
You asked the right person.
Will I know these shields when I see them?
What should I look for?
Like I said, the squad's shields were prototype models. They should all be marked.
But the Imperials won't just hand them back nicely. You've got a hard fight ahead of you. Stay sharp.
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
You might change your tune if the Imperial military adapts our shielding technology. I've work to do.
I'll take any messages later.
